name: @super-productivity/plugin-dev
description: Plugin development workspace for Super Productivity

scripts.build:minimal: cd minimal-plugin && zip -r ../minimal-plugin.zip manifest.json plugin.js README.md && cd .. && echo '✓ Built minimal-plugin.zip'
scripts.build:simple: cd simple-typescript-plugin && npm install && npm run build && cd .. && echo '✓ Built simple-typescript-plugin'
scripts.build:example: cd example-plugin && npm install && npm run build && npm run package && cd .. && echo '✓ Built example-plugin'
scripts.build:procrastination: cd procrastination-buster && npm install && npm run build && npm run package && cd .. && echo '✓ Built procrastination-buster'
scripts.list: echo 'Available plugins:' && ls -d */ | grep -v node_modules | grep -v scripts
